data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Morais, Ana Carla C., Ribeiro-Costa, Cibele S., Linzmeier, Adelita M. (2016): On the taxonomy of the Brazilian flea beetle genus Miritius Bechyné & Bechyné (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Galerucinae: Alticini: Monoplatina) with description of two new species. Zootaxa 4067 (3): 334-344, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4067.3.3
